Class DomCharacterData

java.lang.Object
  com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomNode
      com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.DomCharacterData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, CharacterData, Node
Direct Known Subclasses:
DomComment, DomText
public abstract class DomCharacterData
extends DomNode
implements CharacterData

Wrapper for the DOM node CharacterData.

$Revision: 1.1 $

Parameters:

count - the number of characters to be replaced
